thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 05 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Canopy Growth And Canopy Rivers Announce Strategic Agreement With Livewell Foods

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Canopy Growth And Canopy Rivers Announce Strategic Agreement With Livewell Foods
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Canopy Growth Corp:
* CANOPY GROWTH AND CANOPY RIVERS ANNOUNCE STRATEGIC AGREEMENT WITH LIVEWELL FOODS
* AS PART OF DEAL, SUBJECT TO COMPLETION OF CERTAIN MILESTONES, CANOPY GROWTH AND CANOPY RIVERS, WILL EACH BE ISSUED EQUITY IN LIVEWELL
* ‍AS PART OF AGREEMENT, SUBJECT TO COMPLETION OF CERTAIN MILESTONES, CANOPY GROWTH, CANOPY RIVERS, WILL EACH BE ISSUED EQUITY IN LIVEWELL​
* ‍LIVEWELL HAS OPTION TO DRAW ON UP TO $20 MILLION OF DEBT FINANCING FROM CANOPY RIVERS TO SUPPORT LIVEWELL’S CONTINUED GROWTH INITIATIVES​
* LIVEWELL HAS ALSO RECEIVED AN INITIAL PURCHASE AGREEMENT FROM CANOPY, FOR CANNABIS PRODUCTION AT OTTAWA PROJECT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
